hero.description: QonnectOne is a revolutionary technological solution that supports companies and supervised institutions in key operational and regulatory areas. Additionally, it ensures regulatory compliance, provides instant payment processing, and supports systematic revenue growth through process automation.
hero.unlock: Unlock business potential and earn more

footer.description: Comprehensive solutions for payment integration for companies and supervised financial institutions. Security, innovation and regulatory compliance.

q1.question: 1. Why Qonnect?
q1.answer: Because the offer is tailored to the specific requirements of your company. Our developers can quickly adapt parts of the application to your industry and individual requirements.

q2.question: 2. Why use an external partner instead of your own system?
q2.answer: Developing a dedicated IT system involves costs and risks. With us, you can do it in record time, get ahead of the competition and benefit from a well-developed system.

q3.question: 3. What is a SaaS application?
q3.answer: A SaaS (Software as a Service) application is software made available to users over the Internet on a subscription basis. It does not require installation on a computer - you use it through a browser. All data and updates are maintained in the cloud by the service provider.

caseStudies.text: Discover real stories from our clients and see how they increased efficiency and profits thanks to our platform.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Privacy Policy for the websites operated by QonnectOne Sp. z o.o. based in Gda≈Ñsk
hero.description: This Privacy Policy sets out the rules for processing and protecting the personal data of users of QonnectOne websites in accordance with the GDPR.

definitions.title: Definitions used in this Privacy Policy

cards.title: User
cards.description: A natural person, legal person or organisational unit without legal personality that uses the electronic services provided through the websites referred to in point 2.

cards.title: Personal data
cards.description: Information about an identified or identifiable natural person; an identifiable natural person is one who can be identified, directly or indirectly, in particular by reference to an identifier such as a name, identification number, location data, online identifier or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity of that natural person.

cards.title: Company / Data Controller
cards.description: QonnectOne sp√≥≈Çka z ograniczonƒÖ odpowiedzialno≈õciƒÖ with its registered office in Gda≈Ñsk, ul. Lƒôborska 3B, 80-386 Gda≈Ñsk, entered into the register of entrepreneurs kept by the District Court Gda≈Ñsk-P√≥≈Çnoc in Gda≈Ñsk, 7th Commercial Division of the National Court Register, KRS: 0001160997, REGON: 54115490, NIP: 5842865648; share capital: PLN 750,000.

cards.title: Websites
cards.description: Websites hosted under the domain www.qonnectone.com, each of which is individually referred to as the ‚ÄúWebsite‚Äù.

cards.title: GDPR
cards.description: Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, repealing Directive 95/46/EC.

dpoCard.title: Data Protection Officer
dpoCard.description: The Data Controller has appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO). You can contact the DPO in any matter related to the processing of personal data by the Controller.

sources.title: Sources of personal data
sources.intro: The Data Controller collects personal data through:
items: information and data voluntarily entered into Website forms
storing cookies on end user devices
autoParagraphs: Information about certain User behaviours is logged on the server layer. These data are used to administer the Website and ensure the smooth operation of the services provided.
The Controller does not obtain personal data from third parties. All data are provided voluntarily by the User.

purposes.title: Purposes of processing and legal basis

cards.title: 1. Website usage
cards.description: Personal data are processed to provide website functionality and maintain the connection. The legal basis is the Controller‚Äôs legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

cards.title: 2. Account registration and payment services
cards.description: Data provided in the registration form are used to conclude and perform electronic service agreements, money remittance services, handle complaints and execute payment orders (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).

cards.title: 3. Marketing of own products and services
cards.description: Processing is based on the Company‚Äôs legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR), namely direct marketing. Commercial information is sent electronically only with the User‚Äôs consent.

cards.title: 4. Contact form
cards.description: Data are processed under the Company‚Äôs legitimate interest consisting of responding to incoming enquiries (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

recipients.title: Recipients of personal data
paragraphs: Personal data may be transferred to entities that technically deliver certain services, in particular payment service providers or other partners supporting the Controller.
We may engage processors such as IT and e-mail providers, technology vendors, accountants and companies that destroy data media.
Personal data may also be disclosed to entities authorised to request them under applicable law.

retention.title: Data retention periods
retention.intro: Personal data are stored for the period necessary to achieve the processing purpose:

items.label: Contract performance
items.description: for the duration of the contract

items.label: Website functionality
items.description: for the duration of the connection

items.label: Legal obligations
items.description: for the period required to fulfil statutory duties

items.label: Claims
items.description: for the limitation period of potential claims

items.label: Marketing
items.description: until consent is withdrawn or the processing purpose is fully achieved

basic.title: Core rights
basic.intro: The User has the right to:

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal of consent
paragraphs: If we process data on the basis of consent, the User may withdraw it at any time by sending an e-mail to hello@qonnectone.com.
Withdrawal of consent does not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out before its withdrawal nor processing performed on other legal grounds.

complaint.title: Right to lodge a complaint
complaint.description: The User may lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority in the EU member state of their habitual residence, workplace or the place of the alleged infringement. In Poland this is the President of the Personal Data Protection Office (PUODO), ul. Stawki 2, 00-193 Warsaw, phone: +48 22 531 03 00.

cards.title: What are cookies?
paragraphs: Cookies are small text files stored on the User‚Äôs device to enable use of the Website.
They usually contain the website name, storage duration on the device and a unique identifier.

cards.title: Types of cookies
paragraphs: The Website uses two types of cookies:
list: session cookies ‚Äì temporary files stored until logging out, leaving the website or closing the browser
persistent cookies ‚Äì stored on the device for the time specified in their parameters or until deleted by the User

cards.title: Purposes of cookies
list: creating statistics that help us understand how Users interact with the Website
maintaining the User session after logging in so login data do not need to be re-entered on each page

cards.title: Managing cookies
paragraphs: Web browsers usually allow cookies to be stored on the device by default. Users can change these settings at any time.
Limiting or disabling cookies may affect some Website functionalities.

cards.title: Effective date
paragraphs: This Privacy Policy together with the Cookie Policy has been in force since 1 September 2025.

cards.title: Policy changes
paragraphs: We reserve the right to amend the Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy at any time. The updated text will be available on the main pages of the Websites under ‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù.

Users will be informed about planned changes at least one week in advance, together with the scope of changes and the effective date. If a User does not accept the changes, the electronic service agreement will terminate at the end of the notice period.

solution.sectionSubtitle: Tools for companies and supervised financial institutions
solution.sectionDescription: Our integrated platform includes a range of advanced modules that support key operational and regulatory areas. Thus, QonnectOne ensures smooth operation, compliance, efficiency and measurable savings while maximizing revenue potential.

aml.title: AML / KYC Module
aml.description: Automates customer identity verification processes and monitors transactions for suspicious activity. Ensures full compliance with AML/CFT regulations, minimizing legal and operational risk.

transaction.title: Transaction Module
transaction.description: Provides smooth and secure communication with payment service providers and automates their handling in one place. Shortens operation time and increases reliability of payment processes.

crypto.title: Crypto Module
crypto.description: Enables comprehensive integration of digital asset information, including client wallets and transactions in external systems.

reporting.title: Reporting Module
reporting.description: Automates the preparation and submission of reports to regulators (e.g. KNF, NBP, GIIF). Ensures completeness, data validation and status tracking, reducing team burden.

accounting.title: Accounting Module
accounting.description: Enables comprehensive transaction settlements in cooperation with certified operators, facilitates integration with external accounting systems and generates detailed financial reports.

admin.title: Administrative Module
admin.description: Facilitates intuitive management of individual and institutional client databases. Enables efficient registration, segmentation, ticket handling and communication personalization.

backoffice.title: Backoffice Module
backoffice.description: This is the central point of control and management of all aspects of the platform. Provides full operational transparency, transaction monitoring, facilitates user management and all improvements.

api.title: API / Plugin Module
api.description: We offer flexible integration tools that enable quick and seamless connection to any of our Partners' e-commerce platforms using advanced REST API and dedicated plugins.

section.title: BUSINESS CASES
section.subtitle: Example use case scenarios
section.description: Benefits and measurable business results achieved through our solutions

case1.title: Expanding Payment Offerings for National Payment Institution X
case1.introText: National Payment Institution (NPI) X, holding a license for money transfer services, faces a strategic decision to expand its offering with new, key products such as payment cards and IBAN accounts for its customers. The traditional development path involves a series of challenges, including a lengthy licensing process, significant financial and operational investments.
case1.challengesTitle: Challenges of the traditional "build from scratch" approach
case1.challenge1Text: Submitting an application to extend the license for new products is a process that requires preparation of extensive documentation and verification of compliance with specific regulations. Its implementation time can be up to several months.
case1.challenge2Text: Building your own transaction system from scratch, integration with various providers (banks, card schemes, AML/KYC service providers) and hiring a specialized team.
case1.challenge3Text: Project complexity, potential delays in the licensing process and system construction, as well as lack of guarantee of market success for new products.
case1.challenge4Text: Once built, the system may be difficult to adapt in the face of changing market or regulatory requirements.
case1.solutionIntro: QonnectOne offers an alternative approach that allows NPI X to scale business quickly and efficiently, bypassing most of the challenges mentioned above:
case1.solution1Text: QonnectOne provides a complete, proven IT system that is ready to integrate with NPI X's existing transaction side.
case1.solution2Text: QonnectOne cooperates with supervised institutions that already have the necessary, extended licenses to handle cards and IBAN accounts. The cooperation takes place in the Payments as a Service (PaaS) model in an outsourcing formula.
case1.solution3Text: Integration with QonnectOne allows for a significant reduction of the time needed to launch new products from months to weeks.
case1.benefitsTitle: Additional benefits of partnering with QonnectOne:
case1.benefit1Text: NPI X avoids huge initial financial outlays related to system construction and licensing process. Instead of asset investment, this model is based on operating costs (subscription, commissions).
case1.benefit2Text: QonnectOne enables NPI X to quickly and efficiently test a new business model on the real market. This allows you to verify demand, optimize processes and collect valuable data.
case1.benefit3Text: Cooperation with QonnectOne frees NPI X from technological and regulatory burdens, allowing full focus on customer acquisition, brand building and developing business relationships.
case1.summaryText: For National Payment Institution X, seeking to expand its offering with payment cards and IBAN accounts, partnership with QonnectOne represents a strategic and optimal solution. It allows for a significant reduction of time to market, reduction of financial outlays and minimization of business and operational risk. Instead of a complex and costly path of independent development, NPI X receives a complete IT tool and support of a licensed partner, which enables quick verification and scaling of a new business model.

case2.title: Business Continuity and MiCA Compliance for Cryptocurrency Institution Y
case2.introText: VASP, registered, faces significant regulatory changes related to the entry into force of MiCA (Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation). New regulations require obtaining appropriate permits to continue operations, which creates serious operational and strategic challenges for the enterprise.
case2.challenge1Text: Obtaining the required permit is a complex process that can take from several to several months, requiring comprehensive documentation and meeting specific capital and operational requirements.
case2.challenge2Text: Without an appropriate MiCA license, the institution cannot continue servicing clients in the field of crypto assets, which means a complete suspension of revenues from this segment.
case2.challenge3Text: Competitors who obtain a MiCA license faster or have alternative solutions may take over clients and market position while waiting for a license.
case2.challenge4Text: Adapting systems, processes and the team to MiCA requirements requires significant investments without a guarantee of obtaining a license.
case2.solutionIntro: QonnectOne offers a comprehensive solution that allows for business continuity during the transition period:
case2.solution1Text: A complete transaction system already adapted to MiCA requirements, ready for immediate integration with the client's infrastructure.
case2.solution2Text: Cooperation with CASPs already holding a license in accordance with MiCA, enabling operations under their regulatory umbrella (outsourcing formula).
case2.solution3Text: Continuation of customer service and revenue generation from the first day of solution implementation.
case2.benefitsTitle: Key benefits of partnership in the context of MiCA:
case2.benefit1Text: Institution Y can continue servicing its cryptocurrency clients without interruption, maintaining revenues and business relationships while waiting for its own MiCA license.
case2.benefit2Text: Possibility to calmly prepare and submit a high-quality license application without pressure related to loss of revenue or market position.
case2.benefit3Text: While competitors may struggle with business interruptions, Institution Y maintains full operability and can even acquire new clients.
case2.benefit4Text: Operating under the license of an experienced partner minimizes the risk of MiCA violations and ensures full compliance from day one.
case2.summaryText: For Supervised Institution Y, facing the challenge of MiCA implementation, partnership with QonnectOne represents not only a transitional solution, but a strategic element of a long-term business strategy. It enables maintaining competitiveness at a key moment of regulatory transformation of the cryptocurrency sector, while ensuring the peace and financial stability necessary to successfully obtain its own MiCA license.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: We are QonnectOne, a provider of a technological solution in the SaaS formula, which revolutionizes the market, enabling non-financial companies and payment operators to immediately enrich their offer with embedded banking services.
hero.subtitle: We act as a central hub, integrating client applications with external financial service providers (such as personalized payment cards, settlement accounts or loan services), all through an intuitive API. Our SaaS model guarantees minimization of initial costs and quick implementation, while ensuring full scalability and compliance with regulations (including GDPR, DORA, MICA).

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to transform complexity into a competitive advantage for our clients. We strive to enable every enterprise to "embed" smooth, native and secure financial experiences directly into their products and platforms, thereby increasing customer loyalty and generating new revenue streams. We provide infrastructure (BaaS engine) that allows non-financial companies to engage a larger portion of customers, without having to rely on external banking portals to create a more "seamless, sticky user experience", increasing customer engagement and loyalty.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: That's why we deliver systems that not only guarantee full legal compliance, but also optimize operational processes, reduce risk and open up new development opportunities. Thanks to our experience and deep industry knowledge, we become a reliable partner in building a safe and efficient digital future.

business.title: We understand our Partners' business
business.subtitle: That's why we provide security, scalability and growth
business.p1: By choosing QonnectOne, you gain not only advanced technologies, but above all a partner who actively supports your business in a dynamic regulatory environment. We ensure that your operations will always comply with the highest security and regulatory standards.
business.p2: Thanks to integration with QonnectOne, you don't waste valuable time and resources on building a new system from scratch, expanding existing solutions or a complicated process of obtaining licenses.
business.p3: You also don't have to search for and integrate with many providers, which generates additional costs and complexity. By integrating with us, you receive a complete IT tool and the opportunity to use our Partners' licenses.
business.highlight: What remains on your side is what matters most: business development.

whyUs.sectionSubtitle: Our hallmark is experience, expertise and a deep understanding of business needs.

specialization.title: Industry specialization
specialization.description: We have deep, practical knowledge of market and regulatory requirements across supervised sectors.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously enhance our solutions to address current challenges and anticipate future trends in the payments industry.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Our modular approach and flexible delivery models ensure the system adapts to your company's needs and growth pace.

experts.title: Expert support
experts.description: Our experienced team assists you at every stage ‚Äì from needs analysis and implementation to ongoing optimisation.

compliance.subtitle: We focus on the highest standards of information security and data privacy.

gdpr.title: GDPR compliance
gdpr.description: Full adherence to the General Data Protection Regulation, guaranteeing customer privacy protection.

dora.title: DORA (Digital Operational Resilience Act)
dora.description: We prepare our solutions for full compliance with the upcoming digital operational resilience requirements for the financial sector.

audits.title: Security audits & penetration tests
audits.description: We perform regular audits and penetration tests to quickly detect and eliminate potential vulnerabilities.

knf.description: The platform is designed to meet all requirements of the Polish Financial Supervision Authority for national and small payment institutions.

hero.title: Cookie Policy
hero.subtitle: Privacy and cookie policy on the website of QonnectOne sp. z o.o.
hero.description: This Cookie Policy defines how cookies are used on www.qonnectone.com and explains how we process personal data in line with GDPR.

cards.title: Responsibility for content
paragraphs: All content published on www.qonnectone.com is managed by QonnectOne sp. z o.o., ul. Lƒôborska 3B, 80-386 Gda≈Ñsk (the "Company").

cards.title: External links
paragraphs: The Company's website may contain links to other sites that are outside our control and are not covered by this privacy policy. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of every website you visit.

cards.title: Contact and sharing data
paragraphs: During your visit you may contact the Company by sending an email or calling one of the phone numbers provided on the website, which means you decide to share personal data with us.
Providing data is voluntary, yet in most cases it is necessary for us to return your message or call.

cards.title: GDPR compliance
paragraphs: Your personal data is processed in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data (GDPR) and applicable Polish law.
Detailed information about personal data processing by QonnectOne sp. z o.o. is available at www.qonnectone.com/dane_osobowe, including information clauses tailored to the purpose of your inquiry.

cards.title: Cookie notice
paragraphs: During your first visit you were informed that we use cookies. The Company's internal servers and third-party IT providers (which may be located outside the European Economic Area) automatically log visit data using your IP address.
The administrator installs cookies that are necessary to provide our services and to analyse statistics.

cards.title: Managing cookies
paragraphs: Cookies are used with your consent. You can manage them by changing the settings of your web browser. Instructions are published by each browser vendor (e.g. Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera).
Keeping your browser in its default setting allows cookies to be stored and your personal data to be processed.

retention.title: How long do we process personal data?

cards.title: Storage rules
paragraphs: We store information and personal data no longer than necessary to achieve the purposes for which they were collected.
Detailed retention periods for specific data subjects are described in the information clauses available at www.qonnectone.com/dokumenty.

cards.title: Sharing rules
paragraphs: We do not transfer personal data collected via the website to third parties for commercial or marketing purposes.
Sharing data with third parties may be required in connection with services provided to the Company (e.g. IT hosting, recruitment, audit, advisory).
We reserve the right to disclose personal data when required by law or when an authorised authority formally requests it and we are obliged to comply.

rights.title: Rights of individuals who share data with the Company

cards.title: Fundamental rights
cards.intro: In connection with personal data processing you have the right to:
list: request access to your personal data or rectification if it is inaccurate
request erasure, restriction of processing or data portability, in cases provided for by law
object to the processing of your data

cards.title: Right to lodge a complaint
paragraphs: If you believe that QonnectOne sp. z o.o. processes your personal data in breach of data protection regulations, you may file a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office (PUODO), ul. Stawki 2, 00-193 Warsaw, Poland.
Instructions on how to submit a complaint are available at https://uodo.gov.pl/.

cards.title: Withdrawal of consent
paragraphs: If processing is based on consent, you may withdraw it at any time. Withdrawal does not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out before the withdrawal.

cards.title: Information about rights
paragraphs: Whenever you provide personal data you are informed about all applicable rights.

cards.title: Contact details
cards.intro: For matters related to this document or the processing of your personal data, please contact us:

updates.title: Changes to the privacy policy document

cards.title: Updates
paragraphs: The Company reserves the right to periodically review and update this document.
